Package common

Class Subscriber

java.lang.Object
common.Subscriber
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Subscriber extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a subscriber in the BPARK system. Each subscriber has a unique code (assigned by the database), identification details (like ID, name, phone number, email), login credentials (username), and optionally an RFID tag for automatic identification by vehicle. Objects of this class are sent between client and server to share subscriber-related information.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Subscriber

      public Subscriber(int subscriberCode, String userId, String firstName, String lastName, String phoneNum, String email, String username, String tagId)
      Full constructor ג€” used when loading a complete subscriber record from the database.
      Parameters:
      subscriberCode - unique internal code
      userId - national ID
      firstName - subscriber's first name
      lastName - subscriber's last name
      phoneNum - mobile phone number
      email - contact email
      username - system login name
      tagId - optional RFID tag

    • Subscriber

      Parameters:
      subscriberCode - unique ID of the subscriber

    • equals

      public static boolean equals(Subscriber a, Subscriber b)
      Compares all main subscriber fields (excluding tagId) to check if two subscriber records represent the same data.
      Parameters:
      a - first subscriber
      b - second subscriber
      Returns:
      true if all fields match, false otherwise
